sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This script turns off client transaction logging when the UI response time is set to false.
Note: It should be run only on Upgrades</description> <name>Disable Client Transactions Logging</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) { if (gs.getProperty('glide.ui.response_time') == 'false') gs.setProperty('glide.client.track_transaction_timings', 'false'); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-04-26 22:56:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>52556cf50f0133005203cbb2ff767eb5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Disable Client Transactions Logging</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Client Transaction Timings" source="com.glide.client_transaction">600874ec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f68</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_52556cf50f0133005203cbb2ff767eb5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 23:39:51</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
